item.title: Google Home talks to Home Assistant... (Sort of!)
item.description: Hey Google… turn on the kitchen light! I had been waiting to get my hands on Google Home since it was first announced, and was trying to find all the valid reasons not to jump on the Amazon Echo bandwagon yet. My reasons It’s not Google From what I’ve read and seen in the reviews, Alexa is not as sophisticated as Google Assistant Most of Amazon’s services are not available in Australia yet
